name: They're Watching
description:
You hear them.

Through the doors.

Following you.

Watching you.

1985.

Do you remember?

----------------------------------------

As you wander the same hallway and go into

the same room repeatedly, you can see things

changing around you... and hear things moving around you.

They're Watching is a game that creates a lot of its horror 

through faint sounds, so definitely make sure you wear headphones while playing. 

----------------------------------------

For the best experience (recommended), play this game alone

in a dark and quiet room.
